BecomeSeller.title: Become a Seller
BecomeSeller.description: Join our platform and start selling your products or services.

feature1.title: Check duplicate products
feature1.description: The entire store is committed to not selling duplicates. Our system will check each product one by one to ensure that the product delivered to the user has never been sold to anyone else on the site, and the product you have purchased cannot be sold to anyone else.

feature2.title: Deposit & Auto Payment
feature2.description: You just need to top up with the correct syntax, your balance will be updated after 1-5 minutes. All payment and delivery steps are done immediately.

feature3.title: Hold order for 3 days
feature3.description: After you purchase, the order will be in Hold status for 3 days, enough time for you to check and change the product password. If there is any problem, please quickly use the "Complaint" feature.

feature4.title: Features for collaborators
feature4.description: Please read more in the "FAQs – Frequently Asked Questions" section.

slogan.title: A product born with the purpose of making digital product transactions more convenient and safer.
slogan.description: At Taphoammo, you will have a much more secure shopping experience, we will hold the seller's money for 3 days, check all products sold to see if they are the same as others, aiming to create a trading place that users can trust, a site where sellers can rest assured to place inventory, and compete fairly.

banner.title: TOP UP MORE MONEY TO OWN THE BEST PRODUCTS!

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to EbayMMO. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:
informationCollection.identityData: Identity Data includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
informationCollection.contactData: Contact Data includes email address and telephone numbers.
informationCollection.financialData: Financial Data includes payment information and transaction histories.
informationCollection.technicalData: Technical Data includes internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform, and other technology on the devices you use to access this website.
informationCollection.usageData: Usage Data includes information about how you use our website, products and services.

informationUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
informationUsage.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
points: To register you as a new customer or seller.
To process and deliver your orders.
To manage our relationship with you.
To enable you to participate in features of our service.
To administer and protect our business and this website.
To deliver relevant website content and advertisements to you.
To use data analytics to improve our website, products/services, marketing, customer relationships and experiences.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

legalRights.title: 6. Your Legal Rights
legalRights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to:
points: Request access to your personal data.
Request correction of your personal data.
Request erasure of your personal data.
Object to processing of your personal data.
Request restriction of processing your personal data.
Request transfer of your personal data.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: Nham Son - Yen Lu Industrial Park, Nham Bien Town, Yen Dung District, Bac Giang, Vietnam

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.faqLink: For more questions, please visit the

prohibitedItems.title: 1. Prohibited items (restricted) on the page
prohibitedItems.content: Each time you sell a product, the seller is responsible for ensuring that their goods comply with the current laws and regulations and do not violate the Terms of use and the Policy of EbayMMO. Please read the following instructions below about the prohibited/restricted items list. The list may change based on the actual situation, please update regularly to ensure the safety of your products. The following is a list of restricted (prohibited) items:
items: Bank cards (Credit cards and debit cards...): all types of domestic and international bank cards, bank accounts bank accounts, accounts to create virtual cards...
Personal information: personal information of users such as real name, personal documents, electronic accounts and social media accounts obtained from hacking, phishing, etc.
Products obtained from the use of other people's accounts: VPS, keys, etc. obtained by stealing or illegal activities.
Cracked software or malware: Please respect the hard work of the genuine EbayMMo coders.
Sim (phone) numbers from all networks, real numbers, virtual numbers.
Digital documents, e-books violate the law.

sellingRules.title: 2. Rules for selling products - (for shop owners)
rules: Do not use vulgar language, create hostility, or affect other shops.
Do not post personal information or any other contact information except EbayMMO.com.
Do not use offensive images, create hostility, or affect personal organizations.
Do not use images of famous people without permission.
If you do not handle the refund of the order within 3 days, we will handle the refund on your behalf.
Use the warranty feature directly on the platform, absolutely do not warranty through any other channel.

generalRules.title: 3. General rules for all users
rules: Do not use bugs in any form.
Do not perform any actions that damage the page, shop, or other users.

violations.title: 4. Violation of terms
violations.content: Violation of the Tạp Hóa MMO terms can lead to at least one of the following penalties:

shopOwnerPenalties.title: For shop owners: Each violation will receive a penalty. The penalty will increase gradually.
penalties: 4th time: Continue +5% fee for all shops.
5th time: Close all shops and stop cooperation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms of use, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: Nham Son - Yen Lu Industrial Park, Nham Bien Town, Yen Dung District, Bac Giang, Vietnam

description.line1: • Authenticator is an app that generates 2FA codes (6 random numbers that change every 30 seconds) and is designed to let only you log into your account, even if someone else knows your password.
description.line2: • When you log in, you need to verify 2 factors using 2FA, you must use Authenticator to get the login code.
description.line3: • The stall on MMO Grocery sells products that often come with 2FA, use this app to get the login code.

saveString.title: Save this string
saveString.note: *Note: This feature will be saved on your browser, if you change browser or delete cookies it will be lost.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

howToBuy.question: How to buy products?
howToBuy.answer: Add money to your account, then use the balance to pay for your order. Please note that the process of adding money and delivering goods is completely automatic, so you may have to wait a while for the system to process.

nonDuplicateEmail.question: What is a non-duplicate email?
nonDuplicateEmail.answer: Buying and selling accounts in groups carries many risks, especially when the seller is unreliable, as they might resell the same account to others. Our site has a mechanism to check for duplicate accounts (with a commitment that no duplicates are sold), to prevent such risks and ensure that the account you buy has never been sold to anyone else on the system.

howToAddMoney.question: How to add money?
howToAddMoney.answer: Select the "Add fund" option in the menu, then follow the instructions. If the transaction includes accurate details, the fund will be added automatically to your account. You can send any amount (starting from 1 unit).

wrongTransfer.question: What should I do if I transfer money to the wrong account?
wrongTransfer.answer: We often encounter this situation, so please check when adding money. If you transfer the wrong amount, please notify us immediately on Facebook. We will verify and refund the money. Note: The money will only be refunded to the correct sender to avoid ABC scams.

intermediary.question: Do I need to hire an intermediary?
intermediary.answer: Our policy of holding seller funds for 3 days means that taphoammo is essentially acting as an intermediary for safe transactions. Please note that we only support transactions performed directly through our website to ensure your safety and prevent scams currently spreading on social media. We hope you consider this safer option.

registerToSell.question: How to register to sell?
registerToSell.answer: Please log in first, then select "Register to sell" and fill in all necessary information to verify. After being approved, you can start selling on the platform.

createStore.question: How to create a store?
createStore.answer: First, register to sell, then go to the "Store management" section to create a new store. Ensure you select the correct product category.

optimizeStore.question: How to optimize my store?
optimizeStore.answer: Start by investing in store images, search keywords, titles, and clear descriptions. Next, develop a long-term plan to ensure product quality. We will help optimize your store to make it as attractive as possible when advertised on social media. In addition, the store ranking will be updated weekly based on your sales performance.

topPage.question: How to make my store appear at the top of the page?
topPage.answer: It all depends on your sales performance and customer reviews. The ranking is updated weekly.

salesRevenue.question: How is my sales revenue processed?
salesRevenue.answer: For each successful order, the amount will be in the "Pending" state for 3 days. If there is no dispute from the buyer, you can withdraw the amount immediately after this time. Please refer to the withdrawal limit on the platform.

prohibitedItems.question: What items are prohibited?
prohibitedItems.answer: The list of prohibited items on the platform is continuously updated. Please pay attention to these updates, especially those related to identity theft, such as bank accounts, Facebook accounts, and email accounts hacked through illegal activities and activities related to politics or religion.

discount.question: How is discount applied to orders?
discount.answer: We apply a discount for each successful order, hoping you understand that this is part of a co-development relationship. In addition, the agent program is an option to increase your sales, but remember that you must provide a discount for your agent.

withdrawMoney.question: How can I withdraw money?
withdrawMoney.answer: For approved balances, you can choose the withdrawal option to transfer to your account.

buildTrust.question: How can I build trust for my product on your platform?
buildTrust.answer: You have another option, which is to create a private server for your product and provide an API for our platform. Our technical team will coordinate to integrate both systems. However, for long-term development, you may consider building trust options.

productExchange.question: How do I handle product exchanges for customers?
productExchange.answer: If a customer's order has a defective product, go to the sold order section, select the repair option, then select "Repair action" -> enter the number of products to be repaired. The system will automatically create a discount code based on the number of products needed and send it to the customer.

becomeReseller.question: How do I become a reseller?
becomeReseller.answer: Members who have successfully registered and updated their personal information (name, social media account, bank account - used for withdrawal, etc.) can become resellers on this platform.

startSelling.question: How do I start selling?
startSelling.answer: Browse the list of stores. Stores that allow resellers will have a button for resellers. You should proactively negotiate the percentage discount with the store owner and remember to use your referral link.

withdrawRevenue.question: Can I withdraw my sales revenue?
withdrawRevenue.answer: Yes. Similar to sellers, the commission from each order will be held on the platform for 3 days. After this time, you can request a withdrawal if there is no dispute about the order.

additionalRewards.question: Do I receive any additional rewards?
additionalRewards.answer: Yes. Monthly, based on your sales revenue, we will reward an additional percentage if your revenue reaches a certain threshold.
